籤詩版本二:
Shanduko yemweya yaBuddha uye ruzivo rwako; kutaura kwebenzi kunoshanduka kuita coma
Harahwa yakabvunza svikiro, wadii kumirira nguva?
詩意:
Iyi hexagram chiratidzo chekuichengeta uye isingafambi.
Zvinhu zvose zvinouya panguva yakanaka.
解曰:
Rombo rakanaka. Ndichakupa zvakanakisisa zvangu. Usabate kutenda kwekare. Inguva yekumirira.
Ichi chiratidzo chakazara. Zvese zvinoenda zvakaipa. Chikomborero chikuru. Inogona kuvimbisa rugare.
籤詩故事一:
◇Zvitendero Zvitatu Zvinotaura
Mukati mokutonga kwaMambo Wu weKumusoro kweZhou Dynasty, zvitendero zvitatu (Confucianism, Buddhism, uye Taoism) zvakanga zvakabatanidzwa. Mambo akaunganidza musangano mukuru ndokukumbira chiConfucius, chiBuddha uye chiTao kuti chiite nharo.” Pashure pekurukurirano nhatu, hapana mhedziso yakasvika.
Nyaya iyi idimikira: zvitendero zvitatu chitendero chimwe, benzi risingazivi pfungwa, munhu ane simba uye ane nharo, uye zviito zvebenzi.
聖意: Ichi chiratidzo chizere, zvinhu zvose zvichange zvisina kunaka, zvichaunza maropafadzo makuru uye chengetedza rugare.
